title: WEDNESDAY - Thanksgiving day preview 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - Thanksgiving day preview 2020
description:
The Ravens set to take on the Steelers on Thanksgiving day (0:06) but they'll be down some players as COVID-19 hits their roster. We take a look at the Washington and Dallas matchup as Ron Rivera throws some shade at Mike McCarthy (1:52) Meanwhile, we have injury updates for the Lions (2:30) as they prepare for their Turkey day showdown with the Texans. Plus, a look ahead to Sunday's faceoff between Patrick Mahomes and Tom Brady (2:56) as Bruce Arians, once again, doesn't pull any punches when evaluating the play of his future hall of fame QB (4:08)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
